text:
Hello guyss,
I’m Chintan, and I’m new to open source. I’m also preparing for GSoC 2026 and would love to contribute to R Foundation projects. I’m still learning how the workflow and communication work here, so any advice on how to begin, where to look for beginner issues, or how I can be useful would be
greatly appreciated.
Thank you so much!
